page.title: 03INDUSTRY 04160531
page.content: In this rural area there is not a lot of industry.Most of the land is for agriculture use.People in this area, men and women,travel to large towns and cities to work but at one time most of the people worked in the villages.The area was traditionally a mining area,with four mines with many seams in Hunwick alone.The Pipe works and the Brick works were built because there was a large supply of clay.The biggest single industrial company in our area is Dyson Refractories in the village of Hunwick.Also there is a ready mix concrete works near Beechburn on the edge of our area.
